Articles.Content:
Wormholes are actually a kind of black hole. They would probably merge, thus destroying 2 black holes and creating a wormhole.

What if ice could form at 60 degrees Centigrade?
We'd have to reconsider what we mean by Centigrade. What if the Earth suddenly flipped 90 degrees?

The weather at my country would improve.

What if spacecraft would be manufactured by women?

People wouldn't question it.

What if all our technology was Steampunk?

Coal would be quickly depleated.

What if cows were explosive?

"Cow tipping" would have a whole new meaning to it.

What would happen if the SpacePort came back?

It would suffocate in tag-spammed ship uploads.

What if I had more penguin minions?

The world's governments would slowly fall in the wake of the penguin army, and flightless chaos would dominate the universe.

What if we used HyperEdit to switch the Earth and the Sun?

Ummm.... look it up.

What if Call of Duty was realistic?

Post-traumatic stress disorder. For everyone.

What would happen if the Moon was made of cheese?

What would happen if the Moon was made of cheese?

We would no longer require cow milk, and there would be daily commercial flights between the Moon & the Earth.

What if war machines would be manufactured by women?

Edited August 14, 2014 by Overfloater
So you can see what i'm replying to without going to previous page :^3

There wouldn't be much of a difference.

What if I went back in time and deleted this thread?

Someone else would make it later in time.

What if everyone was a rocket scientist?

Then everyone will think that the moon landings are real. Win.

What if no-one was a rocket scientist and the first moon landing was launched by dynamite?

Then Neil would have said any landing you can walk away from is a good landing.

What if there were more of the original kerbals (there were but some died in reco space station) alive.

I would not use them and imprison them on Eve.

What if I wasn't the only person who regularly posted in the forum games from Alaska?

You wouldn't have posted here.

What if bronies were treated the same way Jews were treated in .... Germany?

Let's just say.... stuff would happen.

What if what if what if what if what if?

Wat if wht.

what if people stopped ignoring Pegasisters?

The internet would relaunch it's flame war between bronies (and pegasisters) and the anti-bronies (and pegasisters).

What if there was a global standardized language?

What if there was a global standardized language?

No one would speak it.

What if there's an Earth-invasion being plotted by alien women?

They would probably take us out since all the guys would not want to fight them.

What if Danny2462 was president of the U.S.?

We'd have discovered the kerbal universe by 1777.

What if the Sun was replaced by Venus and the Sun became smaller-and-inferior-to-Saturn Venus we know today?

I would die of a heart attack and confusion.

What if i went to Venus with a magic spacesuit and fought the last boss of the solar system?

You would still be stuck on Venus. Atmospheric dV requirements ftw (the final boss wins, of course).

What if English was based on another writing system, but still partially based on french?
